column4: anyone back to give me a hand to understand why firestarter icon vanishes afther few secondons even with minimize on tray enabled?

why does the firestarter icon vanish i seen in ubuntu forum no asnwer someone help me please on this grrr
HELLO WHO CAN GIVE ME A HAND WITH FIRESTARTER ICON?
i repeat again my firestartest icon keeps vanishing ubuntu forums have same problem no asnwer can you help ?
from where does your firestarter icon vanish?
that's because it's not autostarted by default and very easily closed
you can solve it by editing the sessions in System-Preferences and add there the command firestarter to start at login
now press add and insert firestarter as command and think of a name you fancy
make sure you don't close the program bya ccident
btw, this channel is actually for ubuntu support, and mint is another distribution
it should be the same since it's both gnome
does mint has a control panel?
